content: kits available here 1 **bobbles optional** is a generously proportioned yoke sweater with long straight sleeves and a modern slightly cropped silhouette worked from the top-down short row are worked after the neckband and plain and bobble stripes are alternated throughout as the name suggests the bobbles are entirely optional and can be substituted with plain stripes if desired designed with sunday morning dk from sonder yarn co this easy pullover wears like a comfortable sweatshirt without looking like one **sizes** 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 **finished circumference ** 40 43 75 49 52 75 56 25 61 75 65 5 101 5 111 124 5 134 143 157 166 5 cm *intended to be worn with approximately 10-12 / 25 5-30 5 cm of positive ease some people prefer a closer fit don t be afraid to select an option that provides somewhat less ease according to your own preferences * **yarn** sonder yarn co sunday morning dk 75% bluefaced leicester 25% masham 245 m 268 y / 100 g mc 3 3 4 4 5 5 6 skeins cc 1 1 1 1 1 1 2 skeins *shown in crossword and simple pleasures * kits available here 1 or 683 726 893 943 1106 1186 1384 m / 746 793 976 1031 1209 1297 1513 yds dk weight yarn for the mc and 127 134 165 174 204 219 256 m / 138 146 180 190 223 239 279 yds dk weight yarn for the cc *while the length of the body and sleeves are easily customized please note that adding length will affect yardage requirements * **size 3 shown on a 37 bust ** 1 https //sonderyarnco com/collections/sweaters
